title: Add complementary background and update email to hellotalentblaze@yahoo.com

requirements.text: Add a visually appealing background throughout the website that complements the warm amber/orange color scheme and enhances the professional B2B service brand aesthetic without overwhelming the content

quotes: add some background which blends nicely with the content of the website

acceptanceCriteria: Background is applied consistently across all sections (Hero, About, Services, Contact)
Background complements the existing warm amber/orange theme
Content remains clearly readable with sufficient contrast
Background enhances rather than distracts from the professional service brand presentation

requirements.text: Update the email contact information in the ContactSection component to display 'hellotalentblaze@yahoo.com' instead of the current email address
acceptanceCriteria: Email remains properly formatted and clickable as a mailto link
Change is visible in the contact card that displays email information

constraints: Maintain the existing warm amber/orange color scheme
Preserve all immutable frontend paths including UI components and hooks
Keep the single-actor backend architecture unchanged
Ensure sufficient text contrast for accessibility
nonGoals: Changing the overall layout or structure of sections
Modifying the contact form functionality or backend logic
Altering the existing SEO meta tags or structured data
Changing other contact information beyond the email address
